dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my goodness! A global player? You're kidding me, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my goodness! A global player? You're kidding me, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, I mean, President Tokayev, he actually stated this at the National Kurultai. He sees huge opportunities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I mean, President Tokayev, he actually stated this at the National Kurultai. He sees huge opportunities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan has significant opportunities in at least four key areas, President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev stated at the National Kurultai in Burabay.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huge opportunities? Like what, exactly? Are we talking about, uh, tech giants here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huge opportunities? Like what, exactly? Are we talking about, uh, tech giants here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah! He mentioned digitalization and AI, transport transit, energy, and the agro-industrial sector.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah! He mentioned digitalization and A I, transport transit, energy, and the agro-industrial sector.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Digitalization and artificial intelligence, transport transit, energy, and the agro-industrial sector are among our main priorities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Digitalization and AI? And they'll set the tone globally? Like, what, they're going to invent the next big thing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Digitalization and A I? And they'll set the tone globally? Like, what, they're going to invent the next big thing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He said they're already, um, top 25 in the UN E-Government Development Index. That's out of like, 190 nations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said they're already, um, top twenty five in the U N E-Government Development Index. That's out of like, one hundred ninety nations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev highlighted that Kazakhstan already ranks among the top 25 countries in the UN E-Government Development Index, which evaluates more than 190 nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Top 25 in an index though. That's just, you know, a metric. Does it mean they're actually doing anything world-leading?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Top twenty five in an index though. That's just, you know, a metric. Does it mean they're actually doing anything world-leading?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He also stressed they need robust data infrastructure. And that digitalization itself depends on energy capacity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He also stressed they need robust data infrastructure. And that digitalization itself depends on energy capacity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President emphasized the need for a robust data storage and processing infrastructure and the expansion of Kazakhstan™s technological exports. However, he noted that successful digitalization depends on the country™s energy capacity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But wait, didn't he also mention a growing energy shortage in the region? How does that, like, add up?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, didn't he also mention a growing energy shortage in the region? How does that, like, add up?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Given the growing energy shortage in the region and worldwide, Tokayev stressed the need for Kazakhstan to become a major player in the global energy market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and that's why he says Kazakhstan needs to be a major player in the global energy market. Even a key exporter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and that's why he says Kazakhstan needs to be a major player in the global energy market. Even a key exporter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstan must not only achieve full energy self-sufficiency but also emerge as a key energy exporter. This is a necessity of our time,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A key exporter? When there's a global shortage? That sounds a bit, uh, ambitious, doesn't it? Self-sufficiency, okay, maybe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A key exporter? When there's a global shortage? That sounds a bit, uh, ambitious, doesn't it? Self-sufficiency, okay, maybe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He called it "a necessity of our time."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He called it a necessity of our time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This is a necessity of our time, he concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A necessity for them, maybe. Doesn't mean it's, like, actually possible to pull off, does it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A necessity for them, maybe. Doesn't mean it's, like, actually possible to pull off, does it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're discussing it seriously, you know, at their Kurultai with experts and officials.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're discussing it seriously, you know, at their Kurultai with experts and officials.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two-day session of the National Kurultai brings together government officials, public figures, and experts to discuss key issues shaping the country™s future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Talking about it and doing it are two very different things, wouldn't you say?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Talking about it and doing it are two very different things, wouldn't you say?
